item.description:
Come celebrate the joys of summer and the animals of WFAS on Saturday July 7!

11am – 4pm: Visit with almost 200 friendly critters at Woodstock’s hip haven for rescued farm animals. Live music for both adults and kids, including Uncle Rock, Joy Askew, The Catskill 45′s and more!

Mouthwatering VEG-E-Q (come hungry!) and lots of food!

Full details at http://woodstocksanctuary.org/2012/06/july-jamboree-2/

Lots of kids activities - Story-telling
Face-painting – Yoga and crafts for children
Hula-hoop lessons – Castle bounce

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: July Jamboree at Woodstock Sanctuary
